abstracts.cdata!:
The project has five major components:
            (a) extension and training services for smallholders in
            rice, rubber and oil palm production and processing; (b)
            construction of stores, offices, roads and group coagulating
            centers; (c) distribution of 9,200 ha of land to 1,000
            ex-estate laborers and 3,100 existing smallholders; (d)
            technical assistance and provision of farm inputs and cash
            through grants and credits to enable about 6,800
            smallholders to plant rubber, oil palm and rice on their own
            lands and on lands allocated to them under the project; (e)
            aerial photography of the project area and vicinity, and
            future smallholder project preparation.
